706269f-b.title: Brooklyn: Pierrepont Street - Monroe Place
706269f-b.text:
(1)
113 Pierrepont Street, at the N.E. corner of Monroe Place, showing
the Unitarian Church of the Saviour.
February 23, 1929.
P. L. Sperr.
NO REPRODUCTIONS.
(2)
The same, from another angle, showing what is probably the chapel of
the Church.
March 1, 1929.
P. L. Sperr.
NO REPRODUCTIONS.
706269f-b.folder: Pierrepont Street & Monroe Place, Brooklyn, NY

705746f-a.title: Brooklyn: Monroe Place - Pierrepont Street
705746f-a.text:
(1)
38 Monroe Place, east side, near Pierrepont Street, showing the
Augustus Storrs House, now ocoupied by the Mendelbaum flat.
1916.
Eugene L. Armbruster Collection.
MAY BE REPRODUCED.
(2)
The same, another angle.
1916.
Eugene L. Armbruster Collection.
MAY BE REPRODUCED.
(3)
The sawe, showing part of the adjoining building (No. 40).
1916.
Eugene L. Armbruster Collection.
MAY BE RER(ODUCED.
(4)
The same, another view.
1916.
Euugene L. Armbruster Collection.
MAY BE REPRODUCED.

706268f-a.title: Brooklyn: Pierrepont Street - Monroe Place
706268f-a.text:
(1)
99-111 Pierrepont Street, north side, just west of Monroe Place,
showing the Reformed Church-on-the Heights, at 103.
February 23, 1929.
P. L. Sperr.
NO REPRODUCTIONS.
(2)
The same, from another angle, as seen in 1927.
November 7, 1927.
P. L. Sperr.
NO REPRODUCTIONS.
(3)
The same, from another angle, showing also Monroe Place.
February 23, 1929.
P. L. Sperr.
NO REPRODUCTIONS.
